title: Got dced from promo game while in champ select now i Cant login "Authenticating..."
body: My internet is working fine on every other game and browser. I also lost one of my promo games to platinum by getting dced and i coudlnt do anyhting about it. Now im stuck at "authenticating" after putting in my username and password. Pls fix i want to play... and i would also like my promo game back :/

replies.body: It looks like our EU servers had a few hiccups with their logins earlier today, but those should all be cleared up at this point. If you're still having problems hit me back and we can take another look into it!
